titles.title: Learn and Serve American Reinvestment Act
Learn and Serve American Reinvestment Act
To provide a direct appropriation of funds for the Learn and Serve America program of the Corporation for National and Community Service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary:
Learn and Serve American Reinvestment Act
This bill provides appropriations to the Corporation for National and Community Service for the Learn and Serve America program. The program supports service-learning programs, which integrate community service projects with classroom learning.
